CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE PSDataLake

    TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'abfss://taxidata@synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = PSDatabaseCredential

GO 

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        DATE_FORMAT = 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss',
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
);

GO


CREATE SCHEMA ext;


GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.TaxiZones
(
    LocationId INT,
    Borough NVARCHAR(100),
    Zone NVARCHAR(100),
    ServiceZone NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = PSDataLake,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSVFileFormat,
    LOCATION = '/TaxiZones/',
    REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
    -- We are going to ignore up to 10 error rows. If more than 10 Error Rows Query will fail.
    REJECT_VALUE = 10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = '/Errors/TaxiZones'
)
GO
